overview: Here's a classic spoof of one of the most popular films of all time! The Sexbusters are a team of hot and horny ladies on-call to save relationships that are lacking in lust. Wives in need of sexual attention call the Sexbusters, and they're on the scene in no time to get their mans sextoplasm flowing! This is an irresistible sex-flick you cant miss!
tagline: I Ain't Afraid Of No Ho!
title: Sexbusters
